Hi Sriram.


> But is there any way to print my messages instead of a dot even when the test
> passes.
Override assertXxx().

+---------------+     +-------------------+     +----------+
| YourTestCases |---|>| LoggingTestCase   |---|>| TestCase |
+---------------+     +-------------------+     +----------+
                      |                   |
                      +-------------------+
                      | assertEquals(...) |
                      +-------------------+

    public void assertEquals(String message, ...) {
        super(message, ...);
        System.out.println(message);
    }
and so and so.

But who cares about which tests passed? What's important is which
test FAILED.


Good luck!

--
Shinobu Kawai <skawai@...>
